        The Promotion Management Menu
        Specified by:
        generateMenuScreen in class BaseMenu
        Returns:

      • printPromotion

        public void printPromotion()
        Prints the CSV File of Promotions. (uses the globally defined "promotions" ArrayList from MainApp) (also calls the retrieveMenuItem method from FoodMenuUI)

      • addNewPromotion

        public void addNewPromotion(String newPromoName,
                            double newPromoPrice,
                            int newPromoMain,
                            int newPromoDessert,
                            int newPromoDrink)
        Method to add a new promotion. (uses "writeToCsv" to facilitate I/O operations from PromotionCSVHelper.)
        Parameters:
        newPromoName - Name of the new promotion to be added.
        newPromoPrice - Price of the new promotion to be added.
        newPromoMain - ID of the new promotion's main.
        newPromoDessert - ID of the new promotion's dessert.
        newPromoDrink - ID of the new promotion's drink.

      • editPromotion

        public void editPromotion(int targetPromoID,
                          String editPromoName,
                          double editPromoPrice,
                          int editPromoMain,
                          int editPromoDessert,
                          int editPromoDrink)
        Method to edit an existing promotion. (uses "writeToCsv" AND "retrievePromotion" to facilitate I/O operations)
        Parameters:
        targetPromoID - ID of the promotion to be edited.
        editPromoName - Name of the promotion to be edited.
        editPromoPrice - Price of the promotion to be edited.
        editPromoMain - Main of the promotion to be edited.
        editPromoDessert - Dessert of the promotion to be edited.
        editPromoDrink - Drink of the promotion to be edited.

      • deletePromotion

        public void deletePromotion(int targetPromoID)
        Method to delete an existing promotion. (uses "writeToCsv" to facilitate I/O operations)
        Parameters:
        targetPromoID - ID of the promotion to be deleted.

      • retrievePromotion

        @Nullable
public static @Nullable Promotion retrievePromotion(int targetPromoID)
        Returns a Promotion object that matches the input targetPromoID. @ Arthur
        Parameters:
        targetPromoID - ID of the promotion object to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        promoObj Object containing a promotion's attributes.
